overview:
Scott Darling, Trulia’s General Counsel and Corporate Secretary, is responsible for managing all of Trulia’s legal matters. Scott has more than a decade of experience representing tech companies in Silicon Valley. Most recently, Scott served as VP and General Counsel at data security company Imperva, Inc. where he helped lead its successful IPO. Prior to that, Scott served as VP and General Counsel at Danger, Inc., a mobile software-as-a-service (SAAS) company where he helped lead the IPO process and subsequent $500 million acquisition by Microsoft. Post acquisition, he was a senior attorney in Microsoft’s mobile communications group. Scott began his career at Gunderson Dettmer representing technology companies in intellectual property transactions, venture capital financings and general corporate matters.

He holds a B.A. from Yale University and a J.D. from the University of Michigan.
